name: Life Nine
description:
A game for Brackeys game jam 2020.2

Dr. Damdna Live has captured Kitty Kitty and is playing some evil tricks for her. Can you solve all the puzzles and escape? Special eastern egg awaits players who finish the game 100%.

I had really fun making the game. I hope you have fun playing it too. The main ispiration for the game comes from Portal games and Glados. I hope You'll like it :)
